description: The Hanau crime fuels fears that Germany has underestimated the far-right terror threat.
title: Hanau shooting: Has Germany done enough to tackle far-right terror threat?
title_page: Hanau shooting: Has Germany done enough to tackle far-right terror threat? - BBC News
maintext: He was at the centre of a scandal in the eastern state of Thuringia this month, when a liberal politician was elected state premier thanks to AfD votes. It has been taboo in post-war Germany to do any political deals with the far right.
